site-address: Land at Barnwood Manor, Barnwood Road, Barnwood
notes: proposal by barnwood trust and city plan proposed allocation. there are proposals for new residential development replacing existing dwellings
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

site-address: Jordans Brook House, North Upton Lane, Barnwood
notes: county council residential care facility site to be vacated early 2018. county council site proposed for residential development

site-address: Allstone site, off Myers Road, Elmbridge
notes: this site has permission for residential and student units but at the point of entry into this register is still operating as a commercial waste transfer station. outline application for housing and student accommodation
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

site-address: Cheltenham Surfacing, off Myers Road, Elmbridge
notes: residential development on this site would be dependent on a new site being found for the existing business. proposed for residential development

site-address: Great Western Road Sidings, Great Western Road, Kingsholm and Wotton
notes: a brownfield site which has been used as an operational siding but which has now been acquired by the homes and communities agency for housing and a university technical college with links to the hospital. proposed for c.100 dwellings on part of the site
ownership-status: owned by a public authority

site-address: Wessex House, Great Western Road, Kingsholm and Wotton

site-address: Gloucester Prison, the Quay, Westgate

site-address: Quayside part of Blackfriars LDO, Quay Street, Westgate
notes: student accomodation is currently being constructed on the barbican part of the site and it is likely that the quayside portion 1.7 ha could accommodate a significant number of dwellings at high density if proposed. Flood risk is significant on parts of the site. A residential led Local Development Order for predominantly residential uses with other supporting uses
